This is an excellent and knowledgeable informative video that tells the truth the whole truth and nothing but the truth. It needs to be seen by everyone. Highly recommended

Very well put together and easy to follow. Full of facts and backed up by numerous documents. This is not just one man's opinion! I've been following this story for years and it's amazing the spin the regular media and our government puts on this issue. Sometimes it seems our media is advancing our decline. This is NOT a Muslim bashing documentary. This simply states the background and goals for the Muslim Brotherhood as stated in their own documents and teachings. Gaffney goes to great lengths to point out that most Muslim's here in America do not wish to follow Sharia and that it's mainly the Muslim Brotherhood gang. I doubt most people are even aware that Al Qaeda spawned from the Muslim Brotherhood. Yet our government bends over backwards to distort the truth about these folks. Political Correctness will be America's downfall if we do not wake up to the reality of what's going on in the world. Do yourself a favor and spend the $11 to educate yourself to the greatest threat America has faced since the Cold War. These DVD's are NOT opinion, they are based strictly in fact and reality, something today's media knows nothing about!
